snippet: The finely chiseled face of Macy's new INC line for men shares his grooming secrets.
abstract: The finely chiseled face of Macy's new INC line for men shares his grooming secrets.
lead_paragraph: Max Irons is the finely chiseled face of Macy's affordable new INC line for men. Good looks and acting talent run in the family; he's the son of the actor Jeremy Irons. Max will soon be jetting off to Louisiana to begin filming "The Host." To prepare for his role, he is hitting the gym daily, sticking to his skincare regimen and to his dismay, trying to kick carbohydrates. I recently had tea with him at the London NYC hotel in midtown.
